main event: A witness reported seeing a UFO with bright lights traveling at high speed over Turners Falls, Massachusetts in April 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object was observed at a 70 degree angle and appeared to have no distinct outline,The object was described as moving faster than anything the witness had ever seen,The witness saw the object making sudden speed changes and disappearing/reappearing in the sky,The report referenced previous sightings by the same witness in April 1957.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a person at a girlfriend's house observing the sky.
